question: 5 (a)
sols_html:
To find the standard matrix of this linear transformation, we simply consider the image of the three base vectors.

The vector [1, 0, 0] is sent to the vector [-1, 0, 0] and the vectors [0, 1, 0] and [0, 0, 1] simply remain where they are (since they belong to the yz-plane itself). Hence the standard matrix of this linear transformation is

\[\begin{aligned} \left[ \begin{array}{ccc} -1 & 0 & 0\\ 0 & 1 & 0 \\ 0 & 0 & 1 \end{array}\right]\end{aligned}\]
